website_summaries.verdict: Packed with all the elements that bring kids' imaginations to life, this Troll toy earns our top spot for fans of the delightful DreamWorks characters.
pros: Kids will love the Troll Tree's bright colors, pods, and ample spaces for their Trolls to hang out, and parents will love how entertained it keeps the little ones
cons: A bit pricey, plus children are likely to want more Trolls characters to accompany Poppy, which must be purchased separately

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea but a little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I thought this toy was amazing but it was just a little too flimsy. It broke apart easily and was very lightweight. My 5 year old played with it fine but kept getting frustrated with the parts falling off all the time and not being able to easily hang the pods back on without my help. My two year old was thrilled when she saw it but quickly lost interest since it was so flimsy and she couldn’t really play with it without it falling over or breaking. I would say that I don’t regret the purchase but for the price, I expected a sturdier toy.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B.

customer_reviews.title: but annoying. Also
customer_reviews.text: Tree and pods seem to be decent quality, but the tree constantly tips backwards, so my daughter always has to lean it against the wall or couch when playing. Not a huge deal, but annoying. Also, I wish there were extra branches to hang some of the pods that are sold separately
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, but plastic pieces of "green grass hills" do not stay snapped into the base and the "door" of the large closable pod falls off when opened. Also as its light weight its a little unstable when hanging larger, separately purchased pods. The base could have been made wider to better stabilize it. Its still usable and kids enjoy it, but get frustrating the it "breaks".
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Falls easily. Not stable
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble however it instantly fell over. My daughter lost interest in this after 5 minutes. The package was also damaged so I ended up returning. If this item didn’t fall over so easily and if the pods (?) weren’t so hard for a child to attach, this would be a great item.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: we had never seen this in stores and I can say its adorable & gets played with everyday
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Trolls, we had never seen this in stores and I can say its adorable & gets played with everyday.
customer_reviews.author: m.may

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter LOVED it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all your little TROLLS fans. Exactly as pictured. Bright and fanciful! Our three yr old grandchild had great fun with it. Wish that it included more of the trolls but, fortunately, we already owned a set that fit the tree and its little pods.
customer_reviews.author: Yendi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this playset. It is well made and very colorful. It was her favorite 4th birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Stanford

customer_reviews.title: My kids enjoy it.
customer_reviews.text: My kids enjoy this. Only place i could find this is on amazon too. It doesn’t do a ton of things but I love toys that don’t make noise. It’s really more of a holder for trolls that you can just use imaginative play.
customer_reviews.author: B Schw

customer_reviews.title: A hit on Christmas! Kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: So cute ! Both kids love this. It comes with many pods , which are decorated in different colors. You can buy the trolls that actually go with it and stand them all around tree on a little “peg”. I have never seen any other troll toys quite like this. Super cute. Does tip over easily though as others stated.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie LaFave

customer_reviews.title: The base could be a little bigger so it didn't fall over so easily
customer_reviews.text: The base could be a little bigger so it didn't fall over so easily. Seems to be the only Troll playhouse available so you can't go wrong if your little ones love Trolls. Wish there were other Troll playhouses available. A tree that actually resembled the one in Bergen Town would be awesome, an actual Bergen Town would be even better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Calling all Troll lovers!
customer_reviews.text: This is bigger than I anticipated. Well worth the look on my granddaughters face when she opened it! If you have a troll lover in your family, this is a perfect gift for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Karlene Hughes-Isham

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for the targeted age
customer_reviews.text: This cute troll tree is actually a fun toy. Both my 3 and 5 year old girls enjoy playing with it. It comes with Poppy so I bought a couple more trolls. This way more can join in the fun. The tree itself is not sturdy and very light weight. Without the pods weighing it down it falls over easily. Otherwise it's a fun toy but honestly I don't see it holding up the fame for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Bobita77

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for the option in packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Just what my daughter asked Santa for. We bought the frustration free packaging since Santa is setting it up christmas eve. Not only was it less expensive, it hides whats in the box! I see people complaining that it wasnt in original packaging so if you want that make sure you buy the standard option not the frustration free one.
customer_reviews.author: CocoPUFF

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was super cute and my 3-YO grand daughter loved it. Appears sturdy and well made and the colors were vibrant. It's very giftable. Perfect little playset. I'm glad I bought it, and I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: TruRevu

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy unless its onsale.
customer_reviews.text: I paid $13 on a lightning deal which makes this worth it. It is not worth more then that. The zipline is flimsy. The pods dont stay on well once you put something in them. My daughter does love the hole in the tree which is the slide. She puts her hatchimals colleggtibles in there.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy for troll fans
customer_reviews.text: Great little troll fort. Most small size trolls fit with this tree. My daughter loves it. She's two and enjoys having her trolls go down the slide and go to sleep in their little houses. I recommend for anyone with a child who loves trolls.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Imaginative Play is Guaranteed!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my twin 5 year olds and they absolutely love it! The Troll Tree is sturdy and pieces are moveable. My kids have several troll figures that they use in their imaginative play. They have even linked it with the Angry Birds toys (the Bad Piggies have invaded the Troll Tree and the Angry Birds catapult in to rescue the Trolls ... lol!) Anyway, it was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carolinadesigner

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter and she absolutely loves this. I've never seen this at any store. Super cute and came with poppy. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Berta R.

customer_reviews.title: On sale! 👌🏻
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to get this on sale, I’m a Trolls fan and I’m using it to make a toy for my small pets.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Balson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Must buy for toddlers or young kids. My 2 year old loves stuffing her toys down the troll tree or places them everywhere. If in put it up she tells me troll tree and wants to play with it again. She plays with it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart immediately
customer_reviews.text: While my daughter loves the idea of this toy, the design is awful. It had a very narrow base, so if you touch it, all of the parts fall off and the whole tree falls over. So you can’t really play with it. Literally, if my daughter tries to even put a troll on it, all of the parts fall off st once.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Anding

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for any child who loves trolls. Very little assembly and easy to snap together. Fairly sturdy and well made.

customer_reviews.title: My seven year old girl LOVED it.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny. 60 second Assembly!

product_meta.title: DreamWorks Trolls POD'ular Troll Tree
product_meta.description:
Welcome to the vibrant town of the DreamWorks Trolls, where a song can lift anyone up, and it’s encouraged to let your true colors shine! Kids can build and explore their own version of this magical village with the DreamWorks Trolls POD'ular Troll Tree! It's over 16 inches tall for tons of trolltastic fun. Customize the tree's look by rearranging the movable pods. There are 4 different hanging pods, including 1 with a lounge area for the DreamWorks Trolls Poppy figure. Send Poppy and her friends (additional figures sold separately) zooming from the top to bottom by clipping their hair to the zipline. That's not the only way down -- the tree also has a slide for getting down in a hurry. Pretend the Bergens are near. . .kids can help Trolls seek refuge in the tree's hiding places. With so many ways to play, it's a hair raising good time!

DreamWorks Trolls Copyright 2017 DreamWorks Animation LLC. All Rights Reserved.
Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Zipline, nooks for hiding, and slide
Includes playset, figure, 4 pods, 3 mushrooms, bug clip, zip line, tiara, and instructions

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
